name: Twit4Java
tagline: A rudimentary Twitter client for Java
body:
### About
Twit4Java is a basic Twitter client written in Java. We are making this for fun and as our final project for our Computer Programming class.

### Technologies
Twit4Java uses the [Twitter4J library] (http://twitter4j.org/en/index.html).

### Authors
Twit4Java is brought to you by @wchern and @nishand17.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
